name: Intensify Psyche
text: A sense of euphoria suffuses the target, amplifying all sensations, good or bad. The target creature gains a +2 competence bonus on Diplomacy, Handle Animal, Perform, and Sense Motive checks. In addition, the DC for any spells or effects with the emotion or pain descriptors cast or caused by the target increases by 1 while the target is under the effects of the spell. However, increased sensitivity causes the target to take a –2 penalty on saving throws against spells and effects with the emotion or pain descriptor.
text_zh: 一股兴奋感充斥着受术者，放大了它所有的感受，无论好或坏。受术者在交涉、训养动物、表演以及察言观色检定上获得+2表现加值(competence bonus)。此外，当受术者正在此法术的影响下时，由受术者所施展或造成的任何含有情绪(emotion)或痛苦(pain)描述符的法术或效果DC增加1。但是，高度的敏感会使受术者在对抗含有情绪(emotion)或痛苦(pain)描述符的法术或效果时，于豁免检定上承受-2的减値。
